summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to reduce the assessments on the westerly Eighty-nine and Forty-two One- hundredths (89.42) feet of Lot one (1), Block one (1), Heirs of Sarah A. Bell's First Addition to the City of Seattle, levied for the improvement of Fourth Avenue and Pine Street by paving the same, as provided for in Ordinance No. 12080, creating Local Improvement District No. 1033.
